TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, however, I have allergies. It's vomit.

I wish for megatiger not to wish for my wish.

Edited September 30, 2014 by Tery215
schloopy loopy time paradoxes
I wish for tery215s wish to exist

Granted. His wish is that you don't wish for his wish, which creates a time paradox.

I wish time-travel wasn't confusing.

Granted. Time travel is strictly limited to one second forward per second, which gets rid of all those confusing paradoxes.

I wish more left-handed computer mice were made.

Granted, but they are made with faulty USB ports that cannot be replaced.

I wish that this wish was corrupt in some way that's bad.

Granted. The post that contained your wish gets corrupted and deleted, thereby making it impossible for it to be corrupted in a bad way.

I wish that I had a T.A.R.D.I.S.

granted. it is run over by a angry marine driving a delorean

I wish for more space marines

Granted, Also, as a added bonus you get a krakenton of leathal space parasites!

I wish that KSP had terrain deforming...

granted, it requires the sacrifice of millions of kerbals to the kraken DAILY to have any effect and to stay that way.

I wish for flying psace marines

Granted, you get the Flying Monkeys from Oz.

I wish that the next wish was actually achievable.

Granted, but it gets corrupted.

I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish I wish... for a non corrupt wish.

Granted. Your wish to live with Justin Bieber is not corrupted. At all. It's permanent.

I wish my kids were old enough to appreciate KSP.

granted. they figure out how to code naked kerbals.

I wish that I could make space marines appear

Granted. They disintegrate immediately after creation.

I wish 'science' was pronounced 'skyence'.

Granted, but science is not thought as a good thing to learn about.

I wish Alaska got more $$$ from our PFD.

Granted. The money from your Personal Flotation Device increases from $0/year to $1/year.

I wish for a feasible source of clean, cheap energy that can supplant fossil fuels.

Granted. After burning the first piece of Unobtanium, it releases an infinite amount of toxic fumes and destroys all life.

I wish for a piece of supercoal capable of releasing infinite amounts of toxic fumes.

Granted. The coal is placed inside an antimatter reactor with a piece of antisupercoal at the other side. When the toxic fumes collide, they annihilate, releasing energy. This leads to the creation of a perpetually self-sustaining clean energy source.

I wish for a pair of Techno Trousers.

Granted. The scientists steal them and convert the techno trousers into a scientist. For science!

I wish that scientists had techno trousers to convert into scientists.

Granted, but someone spill water on it and is rendered unusable.

I wish that KSP 0.25 comes out within the next week

Granted. Squad rushes the update and it turns out that it has a bug in which it overheats your system components and permanently damages them. They find out that you made them release the update faster and make you pay for all damages that everyone experienced.

I wish my computer worked.

Granted... but your computer runs on coal and you have to pa for it until you run out of money

I wish for a better computer.

Granted. Due to conflicting directions in its programming it kills all your crewmates on the Jupiter mission forcing you to deactivate it, stranding you near a mysterious monolith.

I wish gaming PCs were cheaper.

Granted. You Now have crashed the economy by doing this.

I wish that i could go to universal orlando and ride the hogwarts express..

Edited October 4, 2014 by Guest

Granted. While riding it, you and everyone around you simultaneously have severe motion sickness.

I wish flights to Orlando were cheaper from here.
